data.name: FRM_Title
data.value: Basic Web Player Training

data.name: FRM_ParameterRequiredTitle
data.value: {0} Parameter is Required

data.name: FRM_ParameterRequiredMsg
data.value: The {0} parameter is required in order to display the training.

data.name: FRM_InvalidParameterTitle
data.value: Invalid Parameter Value

data.name: FRM_InvalidParameterMsg
data.value: The value ({1}) is not valid for the {0} parameter.
data.comment: 0 = name of parameter (not localized); 1 = the value provided for the parameter

data.name: FRM_UnknownExceptionTitle
data.value: Error

data.name: FRM_UnknownExceptionMsg
data.value: An error occurred. More information: {0}

data.name: FRM_InvalidAttemptStatusForViewTitle
data.value: Training Not Available

data.name: HID_SelectActivityTitleHtml
data.value: Select an activity

data.name: HID_SelectActivityMsgHtml
data.value: Please select an activity to continue with the training.

data.name: HID_SessionCompletedTitle
data.value: Training Completed

data.name: HID_SessionAbandonedTitle
data.value: Training Abandoned

data.name: HID_SessionSuspendedTitle
data.value: Training Suspended

data.name: FRM_ExecuteViewAbandonedSessionMsg
data.value: This training has been abandoned. You cannot make any further changes.

data.name: FRM_ExecuteViewCompletedSessionMsg
data.value: This training has been completed. You cannot make any further changes.

data.name: FRM_ExecuteViewSuspendedSessionMsg
data.value: This training has been suspended. You can return later to resume the training.

data.name: FRM_CannotDisplayContentTitle
data.value: Training Not Available

data.name: FRM_SessionIsNotActiveMsg
data.value: This training has been completed. You cannot make any further changes.

data.name: FRM_ActivityIsNotActiveMsg
data.value: The page cannot be displayed. Select a different page.

data.name: FRM_UnexpectedError
data.value: An error occurred. More information: {0}
data.comment: 0= exception message. BWP only. SLK filters errors so that unknown exceptions are not displayed.

data.name: FRM_UnexpectedErrorNoException
data.value: The training cannot be displayed. Try refreshing your browser.

data.name: FRM_UnexpectedErrorTitle
data.value: Error

data.name: FRM_ViewNotSupportedTitle
data.value: View Not Supported

data.name: FRM_RAViewNotSupportedMsg
data.value: Random access view is not supported in this application.

data.name: FRM_ReviewViewNotSupportedMsg
data.value: Review view is not supported in this application.

data.name: FRM_ViewNotSupportedMsg
data.value: The requested view is not supported in this application.
data.comment: This message only occurs if the view parameter on one of the interior frames is invalid.

data.name: FRM_NotAvailableTitleHtml
data.value: Training Not Available

data.name: FRM_ResourceNotFound
data.value: The requested resource could not be loaded.
data.comment: An internal error happened: could not load the requested resource.

data.name: FRM_NotAvailableHtml
data.value: This training is not available. This may be because the training does not exist, or you do not have permission to view it.

data.name: NAV_NextTitle
data.value: Next

data.name: NAV_PrevTitle
data.value: Previous

data.name: NAV_SaveTitle
data.value: Save

data.name: NAV_MinimizeTitle
data.value: Hide Contents

data.name: NAV_MaximizeTitle
data.value: Show Contents

data.name: HID_ReloadCurrentContent
data.value: Continue

data.name: HID_SubmitAttemptTitleHtml
data.value: Submit this Assignment?

data.name: HID_SubmitAttemptMessageHtml
data.value:
After you submit this assignment, you will not be able to make any further changes.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, you can finish the assignment or close this window. Your work is already saved.

data.name: HID_SubmitLink
data.value: Submit

data.name: HID_MoveNextFailedHtml
data.value: You cannot navigate to the next page at this time. Click Continue to return to the current page.

data.name: HID_MovePreviousFailedHtml
data.value: You cannot navigate to the previous page at this time. Click Continue to return to the current page.

data.name: HID_MoveToActivityFailedHtml
data.value: You cannot navigate to the selected page at this time. Click Continue to return to the current page.

data.name: HID_SetValueMappingFailedHtml
data.value:
Could not set one or more values as requested.

More information:
data.comment: Following this message, one or more messages from exceptions are displayed.

data.name: HID_SetValuePostedDataInvalid
data.value: Data posted about the data model was invalid.
data.comment: This message is displayed as the "More information" part of HID_SetValueFailed or HID_SetValueMappingFailed

data.name: HID_InvalidActivityId
data.value: The activity id {0} is not valid.
data.comment: 0=activity id sent to request as the target activity

data.name: HID_TerminateFailed
data.value: There was a problem processing a request from this page. Try selecting a different page. More information: {0}

data.name: HID_ServerErrorTitle
data.value: Processing Error

data.name: POST_SubmitHtml
data.value: Submit

data.name: HID_SubmitPageTitleHtml
data.value: Submit this Training?

data.name: HID_SubmitPageMessageHtml
data.value:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this training.

If you have completed the training, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the training, click Cancel to return to the previous page.

data.name: HID_SubmitPageMessageNoCurrentActivityHtml
data.value:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this training.

If you have completed the training, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the training, select an activity to continue the training.

data.name: POST_ContinueHtml
data.value: Cancel

data.name: CONV_MappingRequired
data.value: Interaction and objective information has not been properly initialized.

data.name: CONV_SetValueComment
data.value: There was a problem adding or updating comment data associated with this page. More information: {0}

data.name: CONV_SetValueInteraction
data.value: There was a problem adding or updating interaction data associated with this page. More information: {0}

data.name: CONV_SetValueInvalidName
data.value: The element named '{0}' could not be recognized. The data was not updated.

data.name: CONV_SetValueInvalidValue
data.value: The value ({0}) is not a valid value for the {1} element. The data was not updated.

data.name: CONV_SetValueObjective
data.value: There was a problem adding or updating objective data associated with this page. More information: {0}

data.name: CONV_SetValueReadOnly
data.value: The {0} element cannot be modified. The data was not updated.

data.name: CONV_SetValueException
data.value: The value ({1}) is not a valid value for the {0} element. The data was not updated. More information: {2}
data.comment: 0 = element name, 1 = attempted element value, 2 = exception message

data.name: CONV_InvalidViewOnSetValue
data.value: The data on this page cannot be updated while reviewing the training.

data.name: CON_PleaseWait
data.value: Please wait...
data.comment: Message to wait for other frames to load.

data.name: CON_ContentCannotBeDisplayedTitle
data.value: Cannot Access Content

data.name: CON_ContentCannotBeDisplayedMsg
data.value: There is a problem accessing the content. It cannot be displayed.
data.comment: This is a generic error message that happens when the content URL is not valid. It should not contain much information because it basically means either there is a bug in the frameset or this is a hack attempt.

data.name: CON_ResourceNotFoundTitle
data.value: File Not Found

data.name: CON_ResourceNotFoundMsg
data.value: The page you requested cannot be found. Please select or move to a different page.

data.name: CON_AttachedFileDoesNotExistHtml
data.value:
The attached files listed below are empty or do not exist:

Invalid files:

data.name: CON_FileAttachmentErrorEndHtml
data.value: Click Continue to return to the current page.

data.name: CON_FileAttachmentErrorTitleHtml
data.value: File Attachment Error

data.name: TOC_InvalidJsVersion
data.value: The browser has cached an old version of files required for this page. Please refresh your browser.

data.name: TOC_SubmitAttempt
data.value: Submit Training
